messages.content: That's a vibrant area! What do you love most about it?
I often have breakfast at Industry Beans. Their coffee is amazing.
Sounds delicious! Do you go there often?
Yes, I usually go on weekends. My Saturday morning routine includes visiting the Rose Street Artists Market.
That sounds like a fun way to spend your Saturday!
I also spend hours at the bookshop on Brunswick Street.
A good bookshop is a treasure! Do you have any favorite genres?
I live next to Liam, who's a musician. I sometimes hear him practicing.
That's great! It must be nice to have a musician as a neighbor!
I've been really enjoying the local art scene in Fitzroy.
That's wonderful! Have you visited any exhibitions recently?
Yes, I went to one at a gallery near the bookshop on Brunswick Street.
Sounds interesting! Do you often attend art shows?
I always make time for them. After the gallery, I grabbed breakfast at Industry Beans.
Perfect way to spend a day! What did you order?
Just a classic avocado toast and coffee. By the way, my neighbor Liam is really talented, I hear him practicing a lot.
That's cool! What kind of music does he play?

queries.question: What can you tell me about your neighbor?

reference_answer.text: My neighbor Liam is a musician, I sometimes hear him practicing.
